description: In the chilly days of November, nothing is better than a hot drink to&nbsp;warm up your insides. This recipe for Hot Mulled Cider is best-served piping hot on Thanksgiving day after an exhausting turkey dinner. If you are looking for something delicious and easy to make, this is the best drink for you!
name: Hot Mulled Cider
recipeIngredient: 16 cups Pure apple juice or fresh apple cider

recipeInstructions.name: In a large pot, add all of the ingredients and boil for 20 minutes. After that, lower to medium heat until it is hot but not boiling.
recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, add all of the ingredients and boil for 20 minutes. After that, lower to medium heat until it is hot but not boiling.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve with cinnamon sticks in mugs or glasses!
